name: e9fe3837-1779-4363-b1dc-a615d34e85bd
goal: Payment Gateway - to redirect and pay the amount once ordered the ingredients

steps.text: Bot: Thank you for placing your order! Your order has been received. You will now be redirected to the payment gateway to complete the transaction.
Bot: Please click the following link to proceed with the payment: [Payment Gateway URL]
Bot: Your payment has been successfully processed! Your order is now complete. Thank you for shopping with us!
